title: 175: Mike Johnson is a Broad!
itunes:title: 175: Mike Johnson is a Broad!
description:
The Broads are FINALLY able to chat with their forever favorite of Bach Nation, Mike Johnson!! Their conversation begins at 00:15:15 minutes in and somehow Mike is even more wonderful IRL! They chat about his final meal/drink, what he was like growing up, spirituality, HIS BOOK (“Making the Love You Want”), living with LUKE P, his time on The Bachelorette BTS, Jed, Matt James, his thoughts on not being asked to be The Bachelor, The Broads declaring their love for him, and much more! 
MIKE JOHNSON:
Follow: @mike_johnson
“Making the Love You Want” available OCT 2!
www.mikejohnsonsmile.com (http://www.mikejohnsonsmile.com/)
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
